title: Can we talk about Phase Rush Darius Being the Most Toxic Thing in This Game?
body: Not one ranked or draft game I haven't banned him cause of how toxic this build is. Might as well call it no escape (especially when they have ghost flash).  The amount of bulldozing damage he can do early game is ridiculous and its such an easy snowball for him. Oh look Riot is Buffing him too with an already 36% banrate. Cool can't wait to never see him in my games again.
